i1.name: Organic Deconstruction
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vel'Koz's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Deconstruction'' to enemies hit for 7 seconds. [[Basic attack]]s and subsequent hits refresh the duration.
The third stack consumes them all to deal {{as|{{pp|33 to 169}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Vel'Koz's Champion ability apply a stack of Deconstruction to enemies hit for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and subsequent hits refresh the duration.
The third stack consumes them all to deal 33 âˆ’ 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus true damage.

q1.name: Plasma Fission
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% decaying over a few seconds.
''Plasma Fission'' can be recast after {{fd|0.25}} seconds while the bolt is in flight, and does so automatically upon hitting an enemy or maximum range.
{{sbc|Recast:}} The bolt splits in two {{tt|over {{fd|0.25}} seconds|Estimated}}, each part firing in perpendicular opposite directions.
Each time ''Plasma Fission'' kills an enemy, '''Vel'Koz''' restores {{sti|mana|{{as|mana}}}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, slowing them by 70% decaying over a few seconds.
Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the bolt is in flight, and does so automatically upon hitting an enemy or maximum range.
Recast: The bolt splits in two over 0.25 seconds, each part firing in perpendicular opposite directions.
Each time Plasma Fission kills an enemy, Vel'Koz restores mana.
leveling: {{st|Mana Restore per Kill|{{as|{{ap|20 to 30}}|mana}}|Maximum Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|20*3 to 30*3}}|mana}}}}
q1.notes:
* The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** Detonating the ability manually does not.
* An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a {{tip|spell shield}}.
* The split occurs at a location 55 units in front of the primary bolt's final location.
* ''Plasma Fission'' can reach a maximum 1595 units diagonally (ignoring the split missile's width and enemy hitbox radius), reaching this distance after a total of about ~{{fd|1.65}} seconds.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)
  • Slow Duration:

• Mana Restore per Kill:
  • Maximum Mana Restored:

w1.name: Void Rift
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vel'Koz''' periodically [[stock]]s a charge of ''Void Rift'', up to a maximum of 2.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' cracks a rift in the target direction that opens after a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, cascading through the area over {{fd|0.65}} seconds to deal {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within.
After {{tt|{{fd|0.75}} seconds|Estimated}}, the rift violently collapses, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within and granting {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a charge of Void Rift, up to a maximum of 2.
Active: Vel'Koz cracks a rift in the target direction that opens after a 0.25-second delay, cascading through the area over 0.65 seconds to deal magic damage to enemies within.
After 0.75 seconds, the rift violently collapses, dealing magic damage to enemies within and granting sight of the surrounding area for 0.25 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Detonation Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+45 to 110+165}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block the ripple and prevent the rift from forming further, but they will not destroy the section that was created already.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks one instance of damage.

effects.str: • Initial Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)

• Detonation Magic Damage: (+ 25% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 45% AP)

e1.name: Tectonic Disruption
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' hurls a disruptive anomaly that lands at the target location {{tt|after {{fd|0.75}} seconds|After cast start, estimated}}, which deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} and {{tip|stuns}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, as well as granting {{tip|sight}} of the area briefly.
If ''Tectonic Disruption'' is cast close to '''Vel'Koz''', the anomaly will also slightly {{tip|airborne|knock back}} enemies hit in the direction of the cast.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that lands at the target location after 0.75 seconds, which deals magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them up and stuns them for 0.75 seconds, as well as granting sight of the area briefly.
If Tectonic Disruption is cast close to Vel'Koz, the anomaly will also slightly knock back enemies hit in the direction of the cast.
e1.notes:
* The required proximity for the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} is relative to '''Vel'Koz's''' position when casting and not his current one.
* While the effect is fully prevented by blocking the missile (e.g. with {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}), the missile may not be destroyed ''visually''.{{bug}}
* The area of effect indicator appears at the start of the cast time.
** It will persist even if the cast cancels (e.g. '''Vel'Koz''' dies before cast time completes) despite the projectile not firing.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will also resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.

r1.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
description: {{sbc|Passive - Researched:}} Applying 3 {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|''Deconstruction''}} stacks to an enemy {{tip|champion}} will mark them  ''Researched'' for 7 seconds, which refreshes on [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|ability]] hits.

{{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay, '''Vel'Koz''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to {{fd|2.6}} seconds to project an energy beam, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' can be recast after 1 second during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration.

The beam deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit every {{fd|0.2}} seconds, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20%, lingering for 1 second. ''{{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}}'' is applied every {{fd|0.7}} seconds to enemies hit. {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} enemies take {{as|true damage}} instead.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Researched: Applying 3 Vel'Koz's Deconstruction stacks to an enemy champion will mark them Researched for 7 seconds, which refreshes on basic attacks and champion ability hits.
Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Vel'Koz channels for up to 2.6 seconds to project an energy beam, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. Life Form Disintegration Ray can be recast after 1 second during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration.
The beam deals magic damage to enemies hit every 0.2 seconds, and slows them by 20%, lingering for 1 second. Vel'Koz's Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit. Vel'Koz's Researched enemies take true damage instead.
Recast: Vel'Koz ends Life Form Disintegration Ray.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Tick|{{ap|(450 to 800)*0.2/2.6|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125*0.2/2.6|round=2}}% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|450 to 800}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' direction updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of '''Vel'Koz''' to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
* '''Vel'Koz''' will {{tip|sight|reveal}} himself if the ray is near an enemy champion.
* The beam hits in a rectangular shape, intersecting with the edge of an enemy {{tip|gameplay radius}}.
** Because of this, the effect will hit enemies whose center location is to the sides and/or slightly behind Vel'Koz, as long as their radius intersects with the area.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Vel'Koz''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
